features_section.title: Document intelligence, reimagined
features_section.subtitle: Stop skimming. Start understanding. Every feature designed to help you extract value from documents faster.

natural_conversations.title: Natural Conversations
natural_conversations.description: Ask questions about your documents in plain English. Our AI understands context, nuance, and specific terminology for accurate answers.

universal_format.title: Universal Format Support
universal_format.description: Upload PDFs, Word documents, PowerPoints, and text files. Perfect for legal contracts, financial statements, and research papers.

instant_summaries.title: Instant Summaries
instant_summaries.description: Get concise summaries of long documents instantly. Choose from brief overviews to detailed breakdowns of key points and arguments.

export_share.title: Export & Share
export_share.description: Download your summaries and chat history as TXT or PDF. Share insights directly with your team via Slack, Notion, or email.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.description: Your data is encrypted at rest and in transit. Documents are automatically processed and can be deleted immediately after use.

multi_language.title: Multi-Language Support
multi_language.description: Upload documents in any language and chat in your preferred language. Break down language barriers in international business.
